# Install TidyMass

If you don't have R or Rstudio, please install them first.

## R

Download the R. <https://www.r-project.org/>

## Rstudio

Then install Rstudio.

Download the Rstudio. <https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download>

Select the free version of RStudio Desktop.

![](figures/Screen-Shot.png)

## Open the Rstudio

Then open the Rstudio.

![](figures/Screen-Shot%201.png)

## Update R

`TidyMass` require R version \> 4.1. You can check your R version in your console:

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
version
```

If your R version is less than 4.1, please download the latest version of R and install R again. Link is here: \[https://www.r-project.org/\](https://www.r-project.org/)

See [here](https://tidymass-book.tidymass.org/install_rstudio_r).

## Install `tidyverse`

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
if(!require(tidyverse)){
  install.packages("tidyverse")
}
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Install `tidyMass`

### From `tidymass.org`

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
source("https://www.tidymass.org/tidymass-packages/install_tidymass.txt")
install_tidymass(from = "tidymass.org")
```

### From `Github` or `Gitlab`

TidyMass is on GitHub. <https://github.com/tidymass/>

You can install it from GitHub or GitLab.

More information can be found here:

<https://www.tidymass.org/start/installation/>

Install `remotes` package first.

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
if(!require(remotes)){
  install.packages("remotes")
}
```

Then install `tidymass`.

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
remotes::install_gitlab("jaspershen/tidymass", dependencies = TRUE)
```

When it is done, load tidymass:

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
library(tidymass)
```

![](figures/Screen-Shot%2013.png)

If it shows messages like this, it means you have successfully installed tidymass. If not, please contact me via [email](shenxt1990@163.com) or [wechat](https://www.shenxt.info/files/wechat_QR.jpg)

## Install other packages

[`massconverter`](https://massconverter.tidymass.org/) and [`massdatabase`](https://massdatabase.tidymass.org/) are not core members of tidymass, you can install them by below code.

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
remotes::install_gitlab("tidymass/massconverter", dependencies = TRUE)
```

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
remotes::install_gitlab("tidymass/massdatabase", dependencies = TRUE)
```

When it is done, load them:

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
library(massconverter)
```

![](figures/Screen-Shot%2014.png)

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
library(massdatabase)
```

![](figures/Screen-Shot%2015.png)
